issue.title: [GLib] Use arrays instead of columns in GArrowRecordBatch
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4438](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4438). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Because we use "column" as "field + array".

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4438?focusedCommentId=16758038) by Yosuke Shiro (shiro615):*
"column" in GArrowRecordBatch is just a `GArrowArray` but it's used for a column of a record batch.  So no need to change "columns" to "arrays".

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4235?focusedCommentId=16757737&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels%3Acomment-tabpanel#comment-16757737
